summary: The Federal Republic of Germany, also called Germany , is a country in Central Europe.
full_text: The Federal Republic of Germany  is a Central European country and member of the European Union, G4, G8, the G20, the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development and the North Atlantic Treaty Organization . It maintains a network of 229 diplomatic missions abroad and holds relations with more than 190 countries. As one of the world's leading industrialized countries it is recognized as a major power in European and global affairs.
title: Foreign relations of the Federal Republic of Germany
